code: import React from'react';import'./ProcessSection.css';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const ProcessSection=()=>{const steps=[{number:'01',title:'Consultation',description:'Get in touch with our experts to understand your digital marketing needs and goals with comprehensive analysis.'},{number:'02',title:'Customized Strategy',description:'We create a tailored strategy to reach your audience and drive your business growth with innovative approaches.'},{number:'03',title:'Watch Your Business Grow',description:'Implement our proven strategies and watch as your business reaches new heights with measurable results.'}];return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("section",{id:"process",className:"process-section",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"container",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"process-header",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h2",{className:"section-title",children:"3 simple steps to grow your business"})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"process-steps",children:steps.map((step,index)=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"process-step",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"step-number",children:step.number}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"step-content",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h3",{className:"step-title",children:step.title}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{className:"step-description",children:step.description})]})]},index))})]})});};export default ProcessSection;
